mapper.select: select prdt_id, prdt_nm from prdt order by prdt_id

select * from (select pp.plan_id as plan_id, pp.name as name, ppd.plan_deta_id as plan_deta_id, p.prdt_nm as prdt_nm, p.prdt_id as prdt_id, ppd.qy as qy, ppd.priort as priort, ppd.prod_dcnt as prod_dcnt, ppd.remk as remk, f_com_code_to_nm(pp.fg) as fg, pp.dt as dt from prod_plan pp join prod_plan_deta ppd on pp.plan_id = ppd.plan_id join prdt p on p.prdt_id = ppd.prdt_id
union
select pp.plan_id as plan_id, pp.name as name, ppd.plan_deta_id as plan_deta_id, r.nm as prdt_nm, r.rwmatr_id as prdt_id, ppd.qy as qy, ppd.priort as priort, ppd.prod_dcnt as prod_dcnt, ppd.remk as remk, f_com_code_to_nm(pp.fg) as fg, pp.dt as dt from prod_plan pp join prod_plan_deta ppd on pp.plan_id = ppd.plan_id join rwmatr r on r.rwmatr_id = ppd.prdt_id)
F_COM_NM_TO_CODE(fg) = #{fg}
and trunc(dt) >= to_date(#{startD})
and trunc(dt) <= to_date(#{endD})
and prdt_nm = #{prdtNm}
order by plan_deta_id
